content: hinoki cowl is a crochet cowl using heavy yarns with minimalist double sided rib pattern perfect for the gift season the name hinoki essentially means the wood of fire or the wood of sun in japanese depicting its use for building fires as well as its sacred role in east asian culture in taiwan this word is still spoken in tongues due to historical connection short video presentation on youtube 1 or instagram 2 short video of seaming hinoki cowl on youtube 3 or instagram 4 basic information ----------------- this cowl is worked sideways finished with seaming the side **difficulty** easy **available size** one size **finished dimension** 27 cm/10 6 height 38 cm/15 in circumference can be adjusted freely *you can choose any yarn weight and corresponding hook size* 1 https //youtube com/shorts/ln8yufdikba 2 https //www instagram com/reel/drmqigqj18i/ 3 https //youtube com/shorts/gvanzar-hhm 4 https //www instagram com/reel/drqhcrodz2f/
